import React from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faGithub, faLinkedin } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import "./intro.css"; import resim1 from "../Assets/image1.jpg"; import DarkMode from "./DarkMode"; export default function Intro(props) { const { changeLang, curLang, intro } = props; return ( <>
changeLang()} > {curLang === "tr" ? "ENGLISH" : "TÜRKÇE"} {curLang === "tr" ? "" : "'YE GEÇ"}
münir
